title: Marcom Strategy Lead, France
summary: The role you're looking at is part of the Marketing Communications (Marcom) group at Apple. Our team works to ensure that the company’s strategic products are conveyed in the most compelling way to a wide array of audiences in multiple markets and languages across Europe.
description: Insight and Analysis: Develop a deep understanding of the dynamics of Apple's business, the consumer technology category, our audiences, and their relationship with Apple and its products...
key_qualifications: Proven experience in marketing strategy, preferably in the consumer technology sector. Strong understanding of the French market and cultural nuances. Excellent analytical and strategic thinking skills. Experience in working with cross-functional teams and external partners. Ability to lead and inspire project teams. Superior communication and presentation skills in both French and English.
additional_requirements: Fluency in English and French is a key requirement.
